ygData.subject: RE: Rubicite replacement armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Kajil s plans are not off Hatar (who is extremely rare, i have never seen him).  it somes off a rare though non-named Sand Giant in South Ro.  you can not tell
ygData.messageBody:
Kajil's plans are not off Hatar (who is extremely rare, i have never seen
him). it somes off a rare though non-named Sand Giant in South Ro. you can
not tell if he is the correct giant other than he is a few lower levels than
normal.

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 15 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

>
> From: Nicholas20@...
>
> if you faction is
> good enough they will tell you and you can proceed..the items
> required are somewhat hard to get..one is kajji plans from
> Hatur in Oasis..I have only seen that named SG once in all my
> playing..
